option.name: originalContent
option.value: <resources xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"> <!-- Base application theme. --> <style name="Theme.PushServer" parent="Theme.MaterialComponents.DayNight.NoActionBar"> <!-- Use system colors that follow phone theme --> <item name="colorPrimary">@android:color/system_accent1_500</item> <item name="colorPrimaryVariant">@android:color/system_accent1_700</item> <item name="colorOnPrimary">@android:color/system_neutral1_0</item> <!-- Secondary brand color. --> <item name="colorSecondary">@android:color/system_accent2_500</item> <item name="colorSecondaryVariant">@android:color/system_accent2_700</item> <item name="colorOnSecondary">@android:color/system_neutral1_900</item> <!-- Status bar color - transparent to show system --> <item name="android:statusBarColor">@android:color/transparent</item> <item name="android:windowLightStatusBar">true</item> <!-- Enable edge-to-edge --> <item name="android:windowTranslucentStatus">false</item> <item name="android:windowTranslucentNavigation">false</item> </style> </resources>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value: <resources xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"> <!-- Base application theme. --> <style name="Theme.PushServer" parent="Theme.MaterialComponents.DayNight.NoActionBar"> <!-- Use compatible colors for older Android versions --> <item name="colorPrimary">#6200EE</item> <item name="colorPrimaryVariant">#3700B3</item> <item name="colorOnPrimary">#FFFFFF</item> <!-- Secondary brand color. --> <item name="colorSecondary">#03DAC6</item> <item name="colorSecondaryVariant">#018786</item> <item name="colorOnSecondary">#000000</item> <!-- Status bar color --> <item name="android:statusBarColor">?attr/colorPrimaryVariant</item> <!-- Remove edge-to-edge for older devices --> </style> </resources>

option.name: originalContent
option.value: <resources xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"> <!-- Base application theme. --> <style name="Theme.PushServer" parent="Theme.MaterialComponents.DayNight.NoActionBar"> <!-- Use system colors that follow phone theme --> <item name="colorPrimary">@android:color/system_accent1_500</item> <item name="colorPrimaryVariant">@android:color/system_accent1_700</item> <item name="colorOnPrimary">@android:color/system_neutral1_0</item> <!-- Secondary brand color. --> <item name="colorSecondary">@android:color/system_accent2_500</item> <item name="colorSecondaryVariant">@android:color/system_accent2_700</item> <item name="colorOnSecondary">@android:color/system_neutral1_900</item> <!-- Status bar color - transparent to show system --> <item name="android:statusBarColor">@android:color/transparent</item> <item name="android:windowLightStatusBar">true</item> <!-- Enable edge-to-edge --> <item name="android:windowTranslucentStatus">false</item> <item name="android:windowTranslucentNavigation">false</item> </style> </resources>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value: <resources xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"> <!-- Base application theme. --> <style name="Theme.PushServer" parent="Theme.MaterialComponents.DayNight.NoActionBar"> <!-- Use compatible colors for older Android versions --> <item name="colorPrimary">#6200EE</item> <item name="colorPrimaryVariant">#3700B3</item> <item name="colorOnPrimary">#FFFFFF</item> <!-- Secondary brand color. --> <item name="colorSecondary">#03DAC6</item> <item name="colorSecondaryVariant">#018786</item> <item name="colorOnSecondary">#000000</item> <!-- Status bar color --> <item name="android:statusBarColor">?attr/colorPrimaryVariant</item> <!-- Remove edge-to-edge for older devices --> </style> </resources>
